title: Cooking in liquids
creator_credit: Dennis Shand, Gas Council and Film Workshop
brief_description: Of interest to anyone who likes to cook, particularly beginners. This film shows the right temperature for boiling; a time-saving stew needing no preliminary frying; spaghetti hints; a marinade for tenderising; finally, an invitation to be experimental in the kitchen.
